body_html:
@soumith I am also facing the same problem. i installed via
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
pip install torchvision
the platform is jupyter notebook in ibm datascience workbench.
the kernel dies whenever i try to import torch.

body:
@soumith I am also facing the same problem. i installed via
 pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
pip install torchvision 
the platform is jupyter notebook in ibm datascience workbench.
the kernel dies whenever i try to import torch.
